response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only reflects the true worth of the product but also offers you a reasonable saving compared to its market value. I look forward to hearing your response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 9500}
